Issue.creator: muralisr
Issue.summary: Join failed with "failure while looking up the ledger"
Issue.description: INFO 001 KeyStore path /tmp missing false : {code} Not all proposals are on channels (and have a ledger). Some proposals such as to the CSCC for join is "channelless". In this instance, the failure is due to attempting to access the ledger for doing TX uniqueness checks. Given there's no ledger, we have to bypass ledger based uniqueness checks. >
